text.section: In this section, "Program" means the Maryland Pedestrian Safety Program.
There is a Pedestrian Safety Program within the Department.

The Program is funded by:
The Highway Safety Operating Program of the State Highway Administration; and
Any other moneys accepted for the benefit of the Program from any governmental or private source.

section.section: The Secretary shall award grants under the Program to counties, municipalities, and nonprofit organizations to carry out the provisions of this section.
When awarding grants under the Program, the Secretary shall consider any matching fund an applicant proposes to provide.

text.section: The Secretary shall establish procedures for counties, municipalities, and nonprofit organizations to apply for grants under the Program.
